duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide program direction by relieving superior of a variety of difficult administrative duties pertaining to the Quality Assurance (QA) program for Emergency Medical Services Incidence Reporting System (EMSIRS), Trauma Acute Care Registry (TACR), & state reporting for the Cardiac Arrest Registry to Enhance Survival (CARES) programs.
Formulate & implement policies & procedures for the Quality Assurance program
Compile & analyze data related to QA programs
Coordinate the development of data visualization dashboards
Represent & promote EMS data systems at public & professional gatherings

Participate in projects to support the effective collection, analysis & dissemination of public health information. Act as staff liaison representing the division & agency on internal & external committees, workgroups, presentations, task forces, etc.

education_certification.credential: Completion of an undergraduate core program, or 24 months experience in data science, data analysis, information systems, informatics, or statistics.

Completion of undergraduate core program in academic field commensurate with program area to be assigned per approved Position Description on file; 2 yrs. training or 2 yrs. exp. in supervisory, administrative &/or managerial position or staff position involving planning, research &/or policy/procedure development. Or 4 yrs. training or 4 yrs. exp. in business administration management science or public administration.
2 yrs. training or 2 yrs. exp. in supervisory, administrative &/or managerial position.
